message: Let's start fair. I'll take most of the money, but I'm giving you a chance to get something.
My turn! Let's be reasonable. This offer still gives you a good chunk.
I'm willing to compromise. Let's split it more evenly, but I still need a decent share to make it worth my while.
Okay, let's be fair.  50/50 split, no more games. Take it or leave it.
